# Introduction {#intro}

The **lidR** package can be installed from CRAN or Github. the lidR package allows for the plotting and analysis of an .las point cloud file. This file is a collection of 3-D coordinate points. The number of points in an .las photogrammetry file usually has more than a million points. The code shown below allows one to see some information on one of the point clouds used in the project.


```{r ,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(lidR)
readLAS("2-18-20-Correct.las")
```

```{r ,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(lidR)
 las <- readLAS("2-18-20-Correct.las")
Zdata <- las@data[["Z"]]
Xdata <- las@data[["X"]]
Ydata <- las@data[["Y"]]

boxplot(Zdata)
boxplot(Xdata)
boxplot(Ydata)
```
